reviewText: I love this set. It was very nicely packed. I liked the insert they put in the set to briefly give you information about each episode. Great collectors item. It's a great addition to my collection. Highly recommend.

Wonderful DVD set that is a must-have for any classic sitcom collection. Where I am keeping the S1 What's Happening Now group for my collection, I have gifted the trio-set of What's Happening to a close relative for their birthday soon!
Everyone is quite happy with "What's Happening!!" in their lives...I know I certainly am!!
I love this show and I am enjoying them
My daughter and I just loved every minute of reminiscing with this show... Thank
love this took me back to the 70's and I was laughing constantly.
